body: Are you testing this with your own RTD builds?

No I need to do it, I did a local build.
I'll try to make RTD pass, but I want to make that works locally first.

note on building in a 27 conda env. 
- install scipy
- in **bash** use `ARCHIVE=1 VERSION=3 make gh-page` to build

investigate deeper : 
- try `conda install -c r r` to get R
- then `pip install rpy2`

rpy2 docs still not building. 

Seem linked to DYLD_LIb_PATH found this thread but does not work: 
https://groups.google.com/a/continuum.io/forum/#!topic/anaconda/EKoqtSbwhts

`conda install -c r rpy2` seem to work.
Ok, it works now ! I'm considering a `no-index/follow` or  `index/no-follow` to decrease the presence of these pages on google.
Exceptionally self-merging to see if it builds on RTD as it builds on my fork.
